Installation instruction:

1. Make sure to sync your Candy Crush's latest progress to your facebook account. (If you're unable to do this, I'm not responsible for your game progress loss) 

2. Uninstall your current Candy Crush app. 

3. If you have the Facebook app, uninstall it for now (this process is important) but if you don't have the Facebook app proceed to step 4.

-if you have a pre installed Facebook App, go to application's settings and disable the Facebook app and continue to step 4

4. Download your preferred Candy Crush version 

5. Once downloaded, install the app and after that, open the app right away.

6. Once opened, you should see PLAY and CONNECT buttons, you need to tap the CONNECT button and then log in to your Facebook account. 

7. You should be able to sync and play.

8. If you had uninstalled your Facebook app, you can install it again

-pre installed Facebook app, you can enable it now 

9. Like our page on Facebook and leave a comment 

10. Lastly, most important, Enjoy!


FAQ's 

I can't install the modded CC
-uninstall your current CC app, and then install the modded CC 
-if still can't install, redownload Modded CC, uninstall Current CC, restart Phone, Install Modded CC



I can't sync to Facebook
-uninstall your Facebook App, then open CC and then re-sync 
-check your wifi connection



Would my progress erased and need to start from level 1 if I will use your Modded CC?
-NO, if you followed the steps correctly.
